lrcData.tran: 他们在我们喜爱的歌声里欢唱
我只想和你在此相伴,不想去任何其他地方

lrcData.content: Oh oh oh oh oh oh（x7）
Ain't felt this good since I remember
lrcData.tran: 记忆中从未感觉如此美好

lrcData.content: This night got started when you entered
lrcData.tran: 你的到来让今夜变得闪亮

lrcData.content: Maybe even get to know your name
lrcData.tran: 或许只需要知道你的名字

lrcData.content: I wanna hear the music so loud
Get some drinks inside me right now

lrcData.tran: 你只需打个招呼我就会跟你走

lrcData.content: Let's raise our glass and toast

lrcData.tran: 他们在我们喜爱的歌声里欢畅

lrcData.content: There is nowhere else that I belong
Oh oh oh oh oh oh
Girl, the way you got me feeling so sick
lrcData.tran: 女孩,你让我感觉如此疯狂

lrcData.content: Away with you, with you, with you yeah
lrcData.tran: 让我十分满足,无比满足

lrcData.content: Last call don't mean it's over yeah
lrcData.tran: 最后的招待并不代表就要结束
